entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Blowing snow at times before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
